document.full_text: the new orleans hornets booked a playoff spot and snuffed out the post-season hopes of the houston rockets with a 101-93 road win on wednesday.
document.title: hornets sting rockets in playoff decider
lines_and_colors: the new orleans hornets booked a playoff spot and snuffed out the post-season hopes of the houston rockets with a 101-93 road win on wednesday.
